comment: I love pinterest. It is a wonderful collection of ideas. It is fun and easy to use, but there are a few issues. When there are ads or pins that are in a video format, the audio for them will play even if you're not on that pin. Also, if there are any kinds of videos on a page, it will pause any sort of music or video that is playing in another app.
scenarios: When there are ads or pins in a video format, the audio for them will play even if the user is not on that pin.
If there are any kinds of videos on a page, it will pause any sort of music or video that is playing in another app.
key sentence: If there are any kinds of videos on a page, it will pause any sort of music or video that is playing in another app.
the function of activity: Activity involves searching, accessing menus, filtering, viewing various content categories, managing pins, profiles, settings, creating, sharing, and navigating within the interface.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Create', 'description': 'Tab for creating something'}, {'name': 'Notifications', 'description': 'Tab for viewing notifications'}, {'name': 'Saved', 'description': 'Tab for viewing saved items'}, {'name': 'Avatar: Jane', 'description': 'Display the avatar for the user Jane'}, {'name': 'Access Search Page', 'description': 'Access the search page.'}, {'name': 'Browse content', 'description': 'Browse recommended pins.'}]

operations.event: click<button id=3 class ="com.pinterest:id/lego_pin_grid_cell_id" alt="Video pin from Erin:, Title: A video teaches you how to fold a gift storage bag #origami, This may contain: two brown paper bags sitting on top of a table">  </button>

comment: I love pinterest. It is a wonderful collection of ideas. It is fun and easy to use, but there are a few issues. When there are ads or pins that are in a video format, the audio for them will play even if you're not on that pin. Also, if there are any kinds of videos on a page, it will pause any sort of music or video that is playing in another app.
scenarios: When there are ads or pins in a video format, the audio for them will play even if the user is not on that pin.
If there are any kinds of videos on a page, it will pause any sort of music or video that is playing in another app.
key sentence: If there are any kinds of videos on a page, it will pause any sort of music or video that is playing in another app.
the function of activity: Activity involves searching, accessing menus, filtering, viewing various content categories, managing pins, profiles, settings, creating, sharing, and navigating within the interface.
